title: Add Bengali welcome section at top of Home page

requirements.summary: Add a large, colorful Welcome section at the very top of the Home page that renders the provided Bengali text verbatim above the existing Hero section.
acceptanceCriteria: On route "/", the first visible content on the page is the Welcome section containing exactly the provided Bengali text verbatim.
The Welcome section renders above (before) the existing Hero section.

file_operations.description: Create a new Home page Welcome section component with prominent styling (large, colorful) that renders the Bengali welcome text verbatim as its primary content.
Wire the new WelcomeSection into the Home page so it appears at the very top of the page (before the existing HeroSection) on route "/".
